snippet.title: Free Coast nanny service makes shopping a breeze
snippet.content:
AN EXCLUSIVE new service allows parents to take some time to themselves at the shops while their little ones are in capable hands. Kawana Shoppingworld has announced the launch of complimentary service, Shopping Nanny, designed to make shopping with children a breeze. In partnership with award-winning childcare service, Lullaby Nanny Share, the centre will offer Mums & Co. members a personal child-care service. Mums & Co. is a local community program for mums, dads, grandparents, carers and anyone who looks after little people, with exclusive events, services, special offers and more. The service will provide professional, qualified care for children while members shop, get their hair done, catch up with friends or simply sit and have a coffee. Children will be cared for by fully qualified nannies and parents can choose to have the Shopping Nanny accompany them or have the children entertained in an interactive children's zone. Shopping Nanny is available from Monday to Thursday between 11am and 3pm for up to two hours by booking in advance. Centre manager Claire Torkington, said the service was just one of several making Kawana Shoppingworld a family friendly destination along with a calendar of events, a playground at the Aldi entrance and a five star rated parent's room. "We are thrilled to launch our new exclusive Shopping Nanny service to our Mums & Co. customers," Ms Torkington said. "We understand how hard it can be to find a few hours to yourself to get those little things done, especially for parents. "Kawana Shoppingworld is a community orientated centre which understands the demands of family and that translates to providing services like the Shopping Nanny, which makes life a little easier." For more information, visit www.kawanashoppingworld.com.au/Mums-and-co.
